page.title: 08PUBLIC HOUSE REPORT IN L/H
page.content: The{'Welcome' pub}was built 10 years ago to cater for the council estate.{ {Outside}is a car park with a patio area and plenty of flowers.{ {Inside}the decor is deliberately old fashioned.{There are three rooms.}The largest is the{lounge}in which live entertainment is available most evenings. A{vault,}where people can play games,such as pool,darts and cards. Then there is a{smoke room}for those who wish to smoke away from people who do not like smoking. Young men dominate the vault, older generations occupy the smoke room and mixed age and sex groups use the lounge. Since becoming{the manager}in the last year Ken Openshaw has improved trade 50%. He enjoys meeting people and as an ex-entertainer he has cultivated a good relationship with
